name: Otyugh
description: A grotesque, three-legged creature with a bloated, writhing body covered in filth and long, tentacle-like appendages ending in spiked claws.
memorable: Notable for its repulsive habits and ability to inflict disease, it thrives in filthy environments and ambushes prey.
goals: Typically feeds on garbage and carrion, ambushing any living creatures that come too close.
relations: Often found in sewers, refuse heaps, and can be encountered alongside other scavengers.
environment: Commonly resides in sewers or waste-filled areas.
strengths: Has substantial hit points and good resistance to conditions like charm and fear, along with multiattack capabilities.
weaknesses: Not particularly intelligent, relying on base instincts rather than strategic thinking.
attacks: Utilizes tentacles for grappling and biting attacks that can induce disease.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to swallow creatures, rendering them blinded and restrained while dealing acid damage.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to see in darkness as if it were dim light.
skills: Exhibits effective grappling skills with tentacles, allowing it to control opponents in combat.
additional_information: Exhibits Aberrant Resilience, resistant to being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, or stunned.
Communicates using Limited Telepathy to convey simple messages and images to nearby allies.
Possesses a Stench ability that can poison nearby creatures.
Can use Tentacle Slam to deal bludgeoning damage and stun grappled foes.
The Bite attack has a significant risk of inflicting a disease that reduces hit point maximum.
test_queries: filthy scavenger that lives in sewers
monster with a noxious stench and tentacles
